scripts.clean:build: find packages -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -delete && find packages -type d -name dist -exec rm -rf {} +
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:build && rm -rf dist node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm run clean:modules
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently "pnpm --filter @internal/utils dev" "pnpm --filter @internal/dock dev:tsc" "pnpm --filter @internal/dock dev" "pnpm --filter app dev" --names "utils,tsc,dock,app" --prefix-colors "yellow,orange,blue,green"
scripts.build: pnpm build:utils && pnpm build:dock && pnpm -r build
